00006 @implementation ReturnCacher

00008 @synthesize callCache;

00010 -(id)initWithTarget:(id)_target {
00011         if (self = [super initWithTarget:_target]) {
00012                 self.callCache = [[[CallCache alloc] init] autorelease];
00013         }
00014         return self;
00015 }
00016 
00017 - (void)forwardInvocation:(NSInvocation *)anInvocation {
00018         NSString *returnType = [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%s", [[anInvocation methodSignature] methodReturnType]];
00019         if (![returnType isEqualToString:@"v"]) {
00020                 NSMutableArray *invocationsForSelector = [callCache get:NSStringFromSelector([anInvocation selector])];
00021                 if (invocationsForSelector == nil) {
00022                         invocationsForSelector = [NSMutableArray array];
00023                         [callCache set:invocationsForSelector for:NSStringFromSelector([anInvocation selector])];
00024                 }
00025                 
00026                 NSInvocation *cachedInvocation = [self invocationInArray:invocationsForSelector withMatchingArgValues:anInvocation];
00027                 if (cachedInvocation != nil) {
00028                         id cachedResult = nil;
00029                         [cachedInvocation getReturnValue:&cachedResult];
00030                         [anInvocation setReturnValue:&cachedResult];
00031                 } else {
00032                         [anInvocation invokeWithTarget:target];
00033                         [invocationsForSelector addObject:anInvocation];
00034                 }
00035         } else {
00036                 [super forwardInvocation:anInvocation];
00037         }
00038 }
00039 
00040 +(NSInvocation *)invocationInArray:(NSArray *)array withMatchingArgValues:(NSInvocation *)invocation {
00041         id value = nil;
00042         id valueInInvocationInArray = nil;
00043         for (NSInvocation *invocationInArray in array) {
00044                 BOOL matches = YES;
00045                 for (int i = 2; i < [[invocation methodSignature] numberOfArguments]; i++) {
00046                         [invocation getArgument:&value atIndex:i];
00047                         [invocationInArray getArgument:&valueInInvocationInArray atIndex:i];
00048                         
00049                         NSValue *invocationValue = [NSValue valueWithBytes:&value objCType:[[invocation methodSignature] getArgumentTypeAtIndex:i]];
00050                         NSValue *invocationInArrayValue = [NSValue valueWithBytes:&valueInInvocationInArray objCType:[[invocation methodSignature] getArgumentTypeAtIndex:i]];
00051                         if (![invocationInArrayValue isEqual:invocationValue]) {
00052                                 matches = NO;
00053                                 break;
00054                         }
00055                 }
00056                 if (matches) {
00057                         return invocationInArray;
00058                 }
00059         }
00060         return nil;
00061 }
00062 
00063 -(NSString *)description {
00064         return [NSString stringWithFormat:@"CallCacher: %@", [target description]];
00065 }
00066 
00067 -(void)dealloc {
00068         self.callCache = nil;
00069         [super dealloc];
00070 }
